verses.name: Hebrews 3:15
verses.text: While it is said, To day if ye will hear his voice, harden not your hearts, as in the provocation.

verses.name: Hebrews 3:16
verses.text: For some, when they had heard, did provoke: howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses.

verses.name: Hebrews 3:17
verses.text: But with whom was he grieved forty years? was it not with them that had sinned, whose carcases fell in the wilderness?

verses.name: Hebrews 3:18
verses.text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest, but to them that believed not?

verses.name: Hebrews 3:19
verses.text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief.
